short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension plug-in for website users to quickly obtain external information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension plug-in for website users to quickly obtain external information.
NFTTool Extension is an extension plug-in for the www.nfttool.club website, which is used to help users quickly obtain external website information and update data in real time.
